0.2.name: wordpress/simple-tagging-widget
0.2.description:
This is a Widget plugin to show a tag cloud generated by the WordPress plugin "Simple Tagging".

For this plugin to work there must be the "Simple Tagging" plugin activated (version 1.6.6 or later) and the "Sidebar Widgets" plugin activated as well (or use WP2.2 or later with sidebar widget compatible theme).

From version 0.4 no CSS styles are needed any more!
